moves.1. e4: Hello hiredgun112 fans,followers and WATCHERS!!!! I AM BACK!I know some of you have probably been going thru withdrawals because you have not heard from me lately with some chessknowledge.Here we go.I open with e4
moves.2. Bc4: Bring out the kingside REV getting ready to castle
moves.4. O-O: Castle as planned.This is most important according to my chess mentor(also greatest chess player i have ever seen)my friend trachess
moves.4... Nf6: Okay now he has both cowboys out
moves.6. d3: Chain and freeing Bc1 and Qd1
moves.6... Bg7: His REV out but this is a stunted move i believe
moves.8. b3: Bc4 backed up by b3 and d3
moves.10. Qd2: Believed he was coming after Queen
moves.11. Bg5: I am now setting up for coming atack with Queen and knight
moves.12... Nh5: Repetative confusion?Happens when you come to the knowledge hiredgun112 coming for you
moves.13. Qe3: Back up do not want to spook to bad YET
moves.13... Bxc3: Sacrifice thus opening up area around king for me
moves.16... Bg7: Trying to scare me off target
moves.20... Ng7: To little to late,i do not miss my appointed target
moves.21... Nc2: Waste of time reaper at door
moves.22. Qxh7#: Bang another successful take down!!!!I hope you have enjoyed and learned from this.As always postive feedback accepted and negative tolerated.Have great day .GOOD CHESS TO ALL!!!!!
